Author: ilivetomosh
Text: Food weight. Food is heavy af and fat cells never go away, just shrink which takes time and they fill with water as a placeholder for fat for a while before dropping bc they think they may be filled again soon, so water weight can cause a good woosh also, how are your bms? Try the corn test and see how backed up you are. Processed foods can take a while to pass, especially if they're high sodium. Some bread is quite dense and weighs a lot. I always kind of "cleanse" to get rid of food weight. Fruits and vegetables, lots of water, high fiber, low density foods, lean protein and try to stay away from "bulky" carbs, like a deep dish pizza or smth. Hope this block of text sorta helps lol
